decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.

Condition : 2 - The blocking of the doorway must be indented by a minimum of ten millimetres from the original wall surrounding the doorway. This indentation must be featured on both the kitchen and bathroom side of the infilled doorway, and retained permanently as such thereafter.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted 11th September 2017 and numbered Floor plans, archway elevations and hallway elevations (all unnumbered), Design and Access Statement, Heritage Statement and Planning Statement, therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
description: Listed building consent for internal alterations to include the creation of an archway between kitchen and living room, to block in the doorway between hall and kitchen, and enlarge downstairs toilet.
